channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Metrics Trap: Why Numbers Alone Can't Guide Software Choices
item.description: Quantitative metrics are valuable for evaluating IDV solutions, but they shouldn’t be the only factor guiding your decision.

item.title: Implementing A Product-Led Growth Approach
item.description: PLG is not just for a new breed of tech companies.

item.title: Why Guardrails Are Essential For Industrial AI
item.description: Industrial AI systems are designed with very specific guardrails intended to ensure they operate in predictable ways.

item.title: Former Yandex Self-Driving Group Reemerges As AvRide
item.description: Yandex, has divested all of its Russian assets and its self-driving car group is now based in Austin, TX under the new name AVRide
